document_data.mainbody: 'Benkin Rould''' ({{Pronounce|BENK|in|_|ROWLD|refs={{Cite adventurers league/The Drowned Tower|31}}}}) was a barkeep in [[Mulmaster]] in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Personality: In his life at sea, Benkin had seen and heard all kinds of things. He did not like [[Rydah]], but believed that [[Drayson Fivestars]] got what he deserved.
document_data.History:
Benkin was a sailor until he retired with old age. Afterward, he chose to run a bar.

In 1491 DR, he was involved in the killing of the Cloak Drayson Fivestars. He witnessed him and his soon-to-be-killers having an argument in his bar just before the latter's death.
